citoid-action-replace: Label for button in reference dialog to change a reference type by replacing the contents of an existing reference using Citoid
citoid-citation-widget-insert-button:
[[File:Citoid insert button.png]]
----
Label for the button to insert a chosen reference.
{{Identical|Insert}}
citoid-citoiddialog-back:
[[File:Citoid back button.png]]
----
Label for the button to go back to the generate panel in the inspector.
{{Identical|Back}}
citoid-citoiddialog-credit:
[[File:Citoid credit text.png]]
----
Text giving credit for the source of the retrieved citation; variable is name of source, i.e. 'Zotero'.
citoid-citoiddialog-lookup-button:
Label for the generate button for citation inputs. Unlike "search", "generate" is a process in which there is certainty that a particular result will be found, for example, matching a valid ISBN to a book title.
{{Identical|Generate}}
citoid-citoiddialog-manual-button: Label for the button to switch to the manual tab, shown when there was an error generating the citation automatically. Shown after {{msg-mw|citoid-citoiddialog-use-general-error-message}}.
citoid-citoiddialog-mode-auto:
Label of tab in citation dialog ({{msg-mw|Citoid-citoiddialog-title}}), used to select mode. The other tabs are {{msg-mw|Citoid-citoiddialog-mode-manual}} and {{msg-mw|Citoid-citoiddialog-mode-reuse}}.
{{Identical|Automatic}}
citoid-citoiddialog-mode-manual:
Label of tab in citation dialog, used to select mode. An adjective describing {{msg-mw|Citoid-citoidtool-title}}. The other tabs are {{msg-mw|Citoid-citoiddialog-mode-auto}} and {{msg-mw|Citoid-citoiddialog-mode-reuse}}.
{{Identical|Manual}}
citoid-citoiddialog-mode-reuse:
Label of tab in citation dialog, used to select mode. The other tabs are {{msg-mw|Citoid-citoiddialog-mode-auto}} and {{msg-mw|Citoid-citoiddialog-mode-manual}}.
{{Identical|Re-use}}
citoid-citoiddialog-search-label: Label for the search field where users can enter a URL, DOI, ISBN, PMC/PMID, QID, title of the work, or plain text citation.
citoid-citoiddialog-search-placeholder:
{{doc-important|Do not translate example.com as it is a domain name specifically reserved by IANA for examples.}}

Placeholder for the search field.
citoid-citoiddialog-title: The title displayed on the dialog when inserting a new reference
citoid-citoiddialog-title-replace: The title displayed on the dialog when replacing an existing reference
citoid-citoiddialog-use-general-error-me: Label notifying the user there was a problem creating their reference, and offering to use the full citation tool.
citoid-citoiddialog-reliability-back: Button label for going back to the search form to try to input a different source.
citoid-citoiddialog-reliability-unreliab: Message explaining that a reference is considered unreliable, and can't be used.
Title shown when reference is considered unreliable.
citoid-citoidtool-title:
Label for the button to add a citation in the toolbar
{{Identical|Cite}}
citoid-citoidtool-title-othergroup:
Label for the button to add a citation in the insert menu
{{Identical|Citation}}
citoid-referencecontextitem-convert-butt:
Label for the button to convert a plain reference to a Citoid reference.
{{Identical|Convert}}
citoid-referencecontextitem-convert-mess: Message explaining the functionality of the button to convert a plain reference to a Citoid reference.
citoid-template-type-map.json:
{{ignored}}
JSON object containing mapping of different document types to the wiki's template names.

Each template must have TemplateData defined to map Citoid's fields to the template's fields.

Document types: book, bookSection, journalArticle, magazineArticle, newspaperArticle, thesis, letter, manuscript, interview, film, artwork, webpage, report, bill, hearing, patent, statute, email, map, blogPost, instantMessage, forumPost, audioRecording, presentation, videoRecording, tvBroadcast, radioBroadcast, podcast, computerProgram, conferencePaper, document, encyclopediaArticle, dictionaryEntry
citoid-unknown-error: Error message indicating that the service to create citations has returned an error or is temporarily malfunctioning, asking the user to try again later.
citoid-wb-referenceview-tabs-automatic: Label of automatic tab in referenceview in wikibase, used to select mode.
citoid-wb-referenceview-tabs-search: Label for the search button in wikibase automatic panel
citoid-wb-referenceview-tabs-search-labe: Label for the search field where users can enter a URL, DOI, ISBN, QID
citoid-wb-pendingdialog-error:
Error message for the pending dialog in wikibase if unable to retrieve citation from citoid service.

"Manual" is {{msg-mw|Wikibase-referenceview-tabs-manual}}.
citoid-wb-pendingdialog-message: Message for the pending dialog in wikibase telling the user to wait for the citation being generated to complete
citoid-wb-pendingdialog-title: Title for the pending dialog in wikibase indicating a citation is being generated
